XII.i.3.E.3.b
.
Award Action if Service Payment Data Is Furnished
If the
DD Form 1300
,
Report of Casualty
, or other report or finding of actual death or
DD Form 1515
contains the necessary information with regard to the beneficiary-claimant’s receipt of an allowance, allotment, or service pay of the deceased
do not take action to obtain further service pay data
take award action
determine the effective date according to instructions provided in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, 3.E.2
, and
enter the appropriate information in the REMARKS section of the award print as provided in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, 3.E.2
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E - Allowance, Allotments, or Service Pay Under 38 U.S.C. 5110(j)
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E
